channel.title: Paladious -|| 24-7 VPS-HOSTED || Highscores || Perfect Combat ||20+Players 24-7
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.paladious.com/AD/Paladious-banner-1.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=blue]Owner/Developer is[/COLOR] [URL=http://http://www.rune-server.org/members/justah_/]Justah[/URL][/SIZE]
[URL=http://paladious.com][img]http://www.paladious.com/AD/website.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://www.paladious.com/play.php][img]http://www.paladious.com/AD/play.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://www.paladious.com/Paladious_Client_5.0.zip][img]http://www.paladious.com/AD/download.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://www.paladious.com/highscores/highscores.php][img]http://www.paladious.com/AD/highscores.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://www.paladious.com/forum][img]http://www.paladious.com/AD/forums.png[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=3]My Main Goal For Paladious Was To Have Loads Of Content, And Quality Content.[/SIZE]
[B]Server Features:[/B] Nex Tormented demons Nomad Corporeal beast Revenants Astrea frostweb Sagittarius Bandows godwars Armadyl godwars Zamorak godwars Saradomin godwars Bork & chaos tunnels Barrelchest King black dragon Strykewyrms
Working curses Working lunar All 317 working skills Flawless switches Flawless combat All special attacks All current runescape items Free players friendly All game items equippable Daily updates Damage soaking Flawless combat bonuses Massive training areas Full map skilling Challanging gameplay Supportive staff Professional development team
Nex items Glacor items Polypore & ganodermic Primal Sagittarian Hexhunter Flawless slayer helm Cannon Base for summoning Base for bh
Fight caves with flawless jad Fight pits Duel arena Barrows
- AND MUCH MUCH MORE - SERVER MADE FROM SCRATCH
[B]Media:[/B] [IMG]http://paladious.com/images/bandos.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://paladious.com/images/bank.bmp[/img] [IMG]http://paladious.com/images/corp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://paladious.com/images/dbow.bmp[/img] [IMG]http://paladious.com/images/farm.bmp[/img] [IMG]http://paladious.com/images/jad.bmp[/img] [IMG]http://paladious.com/images/nex.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://paladious.com/images/shop.bmp[/img] [IMG]http://paladious.com/images/thieve.bmp[/img][/CENTER]
